mention.text: President Bush 's nominee to join the increasingly conservative Supreme Court. ; Thomas ' dramatic political and philosophical transformation reveals more about the man than
the increasingly conservative Supreme Court. ; Thomas ' dramatic political and philosophical transformation reveals more about the man than
Thomas , who has declined to be interviewed since his Supreme Court nomination
